title: NFTicket
description: NFTicket is a platform to browse, create, buy, and sell event tickets as NFTs using blockchain. It integrates Metamask for secure crypto payments and offers digital memorabilia, modernizing and preserving the event experience. This innovative approach adds value by uniquely commemorating users' event experiences in a digital format.

title: Doctor & Patient Healthcare Portal
description: Developed a full-stack application facilitating patient appointments with doctors/nurses connected to MySQL. Implemented secure registration and login functionalities for admins, patients, and employees. Utilized Spring Boot dependencies including JPA Queries, Web, Security, and Thymeleaf for frontend. Established an admin CRUD board for user maintenance.

title: X Social Account Recommendations and Similarities
Asteroids Game
description: Added features to Asteroids using topics including: OOP, dynamic memory allocation, SFML library, composition, inheritance, and polymorphism.

title: Wordle
description: Remake of the NYT Classic, a word-guessing game where players have six attempts to guess a five-letter word. Each guess must be a valid five-letter word. The color of a tile will change to show how close the guess was. If the tile turns green, the letter is in the word and in the correct spot. If it turns yellow, the letter is in the word but not in the correct spot.
